name: Through The Shadows (Joana // neolu)
description:
Do you have time for a story?

A story about light and darkness? 

.

.

.

Protect you sanity

Don´t let them get you

run from the shadows

you are never safe; only light will help you.

You are escorting a person through their rough life, who has to encounter their neverending nightmare figures. 

They are hiding in the shadows, where no one can see them. Light is your only hope to stop them. Find your way out and escape them before they catch you. 

The playthrough will reveal the tragic backstory of the protagonist, who had to deal with death, loss and abandonment in early stages, and who are trying to figure out what´s wrong with them.

This is a game for the global game jam 2022, from young german game design students who challenged themselves to present you this one of a kind platformer.
